name: ecelqsi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: Membership of an equivalence class in a quotient set. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
